column1: * This report provides the number and percentage of 11th and 12th graders enrolled in College-and-Career-Readiness (CCR) courses during high school.

* CCR courses include Advanced Placement (AP) and International Baccalaureate (IB) for all years, and effective 2014-15 also include Career and Technical Education(CTE), workplace experience and dual enrollment courses.
Eastern Connecticut Regional Educational Service Center (EASTCONN)
Achievement First Hartford Academy Inc. District
Elm City College Preparatory School District
Department of Mental Health and Addiction Services
